data: {"generalSituation":"The northeast monsoon will continue to bring generally fine and very dry weather to the coast of southern China in the next couple of days. It will be rather cool in the morning over the region, and cold over inland areas. A strong easterly airstream will affect the coast of Guangdong early next week. A dry northeast monsoon is expected to bring mainly fine weather to the coastal areas in the middle and latter parts of next week.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260110","week":"Saturday","forecastWind":"Northeast force 3 to 4.","forecastWeather":"Fine and very dry.
